Description: This auction is for a Gibson Les Paul Elegant Guitar. She is over 20 years old and is in near MINT condition. I am only the second owner and I have had it for over 20 years. I'd say easily a 95 out of 100 on a condition scale. This guitar is a Gibson Custom Shop model. For those of you not familiar with the Les Paul Elegant series here are some details. 1. The are grooved out internally called toned chambers for lighter bodies. 2. They have all abalone inlay on the fretboard. This is an immediate attraction that makes this guitar really beautiful. It might be the most beautiful and colorful fretboard I've ever seen. 3. It has a compound radius fretboard. Meaning the frets have different curvature on them as you go higher up the neck. 4. Finally all Elegants have a Flame Maple top adding to their already beautiful look. 5. Classic '57 Humbuckers (very hot) The color of this guitar is firemist. Some people like red or greens or what have you. This is a very pleasing color, that's a reddish wine color. It's gorgeous to me and sets her off from the traditional Cherry Sun Bursts that are most Les Pauls. The neck on this guitar is all ebony. The guitar is reasonably light for a Les Paul, the neck is on the chunky side for me. The sound is very beefy from this guitar. She gives a very sweet distorted tone. There is a hardshell case that comes with it. It has Gibson Custom Shop written on it as well. This is a really sweet guitar that should make any Gibson fan happy!
Title: Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Elegant Electric Guitar
